h3_title: Captain Kalpa-Wave Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: Be especially careful if Captain Kalpa-Wave starts to jump up and down repeatedly. On the third jump, all pools of blood will explode into explosive lotus flowers, meaning you'll need to either be on the move, or use your Pillar Stance to rise above the attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Kalpa-Wave.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Kalpa-Wave', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Captain Kalpa-Wave' and the sub-subsection 'Captain Kalpa-Wave Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Be especially careful if Captain Kalpa-Wave starts to jump up and down repeatedly. On the third jump, all pools of blood will explode into explosive lotus flowers, meaning you'll need to either be on the move, or use your Pillar Stance to rise above the attacks.
